charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is commited on Counts One and Two of the First Superseding Indictment to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for a term of 120 months, to be served concurrently. Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be placed on supervised release for a term of five years. Term consists of three years on Count One and five years on Count Two, to run concurrently. Defendant to pay a special assessment of $200 and comply with General Order 318. AMENDED: It is ordered that the defendant shall pay restitution in the total amount of $18,655.06. The defendant shall comply with General Order No. 01-05. All fines are waived.
